name: Gravity Mahem
description: Hello! Welcome to Gravity Mahem. Grav and his friends have been kidnaped and sent to an unknown facility that looks alot like home! Grav doesnt know where they are keeping his friends but he assumes the are behind a sereis of guarded doors. guarded by impersonators, they're little holograms that will kill grav any chance they get! Grav has found out to controll his gravity, but so have some of the impersonators. Grav still has one weapon left though... his gravity arrows! can you help grav get through the mysterious facility and save his friends? grav's entire speices (munchies) is in your hands (Also its pronounced Grovv.)
